title: Historical Revenue Growth Trends of West Bancorporation Inc

content.text: West Bancorporation Inc is a financial holding company that operates through its subsidiary, West Bank. It provides commercial banking services, including loans, deposits, and trust services. Analyzing the historical revenue growth of West Bancorporation Inc can provide valuable insights for investors.

Year 2016: $93.4 million
Year 2017: $97.6 million
Year 2018: $106.8 million
Year 2019: $114.2 million
Year 2020: $122.5 million

Over the analyzed period, West Bancorporation Inc has exhibited consistent revenue growth. The company's revenue increased from $93.4 million in 2016 to $122.5 million in 2020, representing a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of approximately 6.79%.

The steady revenue growth of West Bancorporation Inc indicates the company's ability to generate increasing profits over time. This growth may attract investors looking for a reliable and growing source of income. Furthermore, the consistent revenue growth suggests effective business strategies and successful execution by the management team, enhancing investor confidence.

West Bancorporation Inc has shown consistent revenue growth over the analyzed period, indicating its strength in the commercial banking industry. Investors may find this growth trend appealing for potentially gaining from the company's positive financial performance.
